description.zh: Radarr 是一个面向 Usenet 和 BitTorrent 用户的电影收藏管理工具。它可以监控多个 RSS 源以获取新电影，并与下载客户端和索引器集成，自动下载、整理和重命名电影。此外，当更高画质的版本出现时，它还可以自动升级已有电影的格式。
description.en: Radarr is a movie collection manager designed for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It monitors multiple RSS feeds for new movies and integrates with download clients and indexers to automatically grab, sort, and rename them. Additionally, it can automatically upgrade existing movies to higher quality formats when available.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 自动化电影发现、下载及媒体库管理
- 支持对已有电影自动升级到更高画质
- 跨平台支持，无缝集成主流下载客户端和媒体播放器

## 功能列表:

- 添加新电影时获取预告片、评分等详细信息
- 支持 Windows、Linux、macOS、Raspberry Pi 等主流平台
- 自动升级电影质量（如从 DVD 到 Blu-Ray）
- 自动处理下载失败并尝试备用资源
- 手动搜索功能可选择特定版本或查看未自动下载原因
- 完全集成 SABnzbd 和 NZBGet
- 自动搜索发布资源及 RSS 同步
- 自动导入已下载电影
- 识别特别版和别名电影名称
- 识别包含硬编码字幕的发布资源
- 支持多种下载客户端（QBittorrent、Deluge、rTorrent、Transmission、uTorrent 等）
- 与 Kodi 和 Plex 完全集成（通知与媒体库更新）
- 导入元数据如预告片和字幕
- 添加海报和描述信息供 Kodi 等使用
- 高级下载配置文件自定义功能
- 精美的用户界面
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Automates movie discovery, downloading, and library management
- Supports automatic quality upgrades for existing movies
- Offers cross-platform compatibility and seamless integration with popular download clients and media players

## Features:

- Adding new movies with trailers, ratings, and detailed information
- Support for major platforms including Windows, Linux, macOS, and Raspberry Pi
- Automatic upgrade of movie quality (e.g., DVD to Blu-Ray)
- Automatic failed download handling with fallback releases
- Manual search for selecting specific releases
- Full integration with SABnzbd and NZBGet
- Automatic release searching and RSS sync
- Automatic importing of downloaded movies
- Recognition of special editions and alternate titles
- Identification of releases with hardcoded subtitles or AKA names
- Compatibility with multiple download clients (QBittorrent, Deluge, rTorrent, Transmission, uTorrent, etc.)
- Integration with Kodi and Plex for notifications and library updates
- Importing metadata like trailers and subtitles
- Adding metadata such as posters and descriptions for media players
- Advanced customization of download profiles
- A clean and user-friendly UI
